The Transfer/Replacement Type equals Direct Transfer or Roll Over. The Plan Type selected must be either Traditional IRA, SEP IRA, SIMPLE IRA, Roth IRA, Beneficial IRA, Pension Plan, 401(a), 401(k), 401(k) Designated, 457(b), or Other.
